meta_description: A National Historic Landmark, Meadow Brook Hall is a historic house museum, cultural center, and events and wedding venue in Rochester, Mich.
hours_text:
# Visit Meadow Brook Hall.

Meadow Brook Hall offers a vibrant collection of historic tours, events, educational programs and experiences. With so much to see and do, be sure to plan your visit, so you can make the most of your time at this National Historic Landmark.

## Tour Our Estate

Meadow Brook Hall tours offer visitors a captivating journey through history, exploring our Great Estate and discovering the stories of those who lived and worked here in the 20th century.

[Tours](http://web.archive.org/web/20251212142438/https://meadowbrookhall.org/visit/tours/)

## Historical Group Experiences

Whether you’re planning an outing for family, friends, a class, team, or organization, Meadow Brook Hall group tours provide an in-depth exploration of the Great Estate, all at a special discounted rate.

[Group Tours](http://web.archive.org/web/20251212142438/https://meadowbrookhall.org/visit/group-tours/)

Hours

Want to visit Meadow Brook Hall? Our business hours are 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday.

Our tour availability varies throughout the year. 

Tour tickets must be purchased online in advance.

[tour details](http://web.archive.org/web/20251212142438/https://meadowbrookhall.org/visit/tours/) [book tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251212142438/https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/meadowbrookhall/items/?flow=381512&full-items=yes&from-ssl=yes&ga4t=&g4=no&cp=no&csp=no&back=https%3A%2F%2Fmeadowbrookhall.gowebsitedev.com%2Fvisit%2Ftours%2F&language=en-us&u=1f4...

collections_text:
# Welcome to the Great Estate

A National Historic Landmark, Meadow Brook Hall is a historic house museum, cultural center, and events and wedding venue. Built in 1929 by Oakland University founder Matilda Dodge Wilson, Meadow Brook represents one of the finest examples of Tudor-revival style architecture in America and is especially renowned for its superb craftsmanship, remarkable grounds and grand scale.

## Tour Meadow Brook Hall.

Journey through time to learn about the historic estate and people who lived and worked here in the 20th century. From exquisite décor to practical details, the 88,000-square foot, 110-room mansion is sure to delight visitors. 2026 tours start in February!

[tour](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115101127/https://meadowbrookhall.org/visit/tours/)

## Become a Member.

Our members are our biggest supporters – and enjoy free regular touring throughout the year, special discounts on community events and so much more.

[join](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115101127/https://meadowbrookhall.org/support/membership/)

## Attend an event.

Join us for an engaging collection of community events throughout the year. From family-friendly experiences to unique date nights, our events create special ways for the community to enjoy the estate.

[Events](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115101127/https://meadowbrookhall.org/events/)

## Be married at Meadow Brook.
